help.title: Help & Documentation
help.text:
â˜… HELP - V35 â˜…

Official documentation for the Twitch Spotify Bot (Dev: uprisin6).

1. GETTING STARTED
- Click 'Settings'.
- Enter your Twitch channel name (lowercase).
- Get an OAuth token:
  -> Go to Twitch Developer Console
  -> Create a Chat Bot App
  -> Generate a token with 'chat:read' and 'chat:edit' scopes
  -> Or use: twitch token -u -s 'chat:read chat:edit' (Twitch CLI)
- Create an app in Spotify Dashboard, enter Client ID & Secret.

2. AUTOPILOT (FALLBACK)
- Create a playlist on Spotify.
- Set it to 'Public' (Important!).
- Copy the link and paste it in settings.
- When queue is empty, bot plays from this playlist.

3. CHAT COMMANDS
- !sr [song name] -> Search and add song.
- !sr [Spotify link] -> Add direct link.

Have fun streaming!
